Metadata.title: Vanishly | AI Video Watermark Removal
Metadata.description: Remove watermarks from your videos instantly using advanced AI technology.

HomePage.title: Remove Watermarks
HomePage.subtitle: Professional-grade watermark removal powered by advanced AI. Upload your video and let our neural networks do the magic.

signInPrompt.title: Sign in to Start
signInPrompt.description: Create a free account to upload videos and track your watermark removal history.

HomePage.legal: By using this service, you confirm you have the right to modify the uploaded content. This tool is intended for personal use on content you own.

Features.title: Why Choose Us
Features.subtitle: Powerful features designed for content creators

ai.title: AI-Powered Accuracy
ai.description: Our neural networks analyze and remove watermarks with pixel-perfect precision, preserving video quality.

fast.title: Lightning Fast
fast.description: Process videos in minutes, not hours. Our optimized pipeline delivers results 10x faster than traditional methods.

privacy.title: Privacy First
privacy.description: Your videos are encrypted and automatically deleted after processing. We never store or share your content.

formats.title: All Formats Supported
formats.description: Upload MP4, MOV, AVI, and more. Export in your preferred format with no quality loss.

noWatermark.title: No Output Watermark
noWatermark.description: Unlike other tools, we never add our own watermark. Your clean video is truly clean.

cloud.title: Cloud Processing
cloud.description: No software to install. Process videos from any device with just a web browser.

HowItWorks.title: How It Works
HowItWorks.subtitle: Remove watermarks in three simple steps

upload.title: Upload Your Video
upload.description: Drag and drop or select your video file. We support all major formats up to 100MB.

process.title: AI Processing
process.description: Our neural network analyzes and removes watermarks while preserving video quality.

download.title: Download Result
download.description: Get your clean video ready to use. No watermarks, no quality loss.

quality.question: Will the video quality be affected?
quality.answer: No, our AI preserves the original video quality. We use advanced inpainting technology that fills removed areas seamlessly.

types.question: What types of watermarks can be removed?
types.answer: Our AI can remove text watermarks, logo overlays, timestamps, and most semi-transparent marks. Complex animated watermarks may require high-quality mode.

time.question: How long does processing take?
time.answer: Fast mode takes 1-2 minutes for most videos. High-quality mode takes 5-10 minutes but provides better results for complex watermarks.

privacy.question: Is my video data secure?
privacy.answer: Yes, all uploads are encrypted. Videos are automatically deleted from our servers within 24 hours of processing.

legal.question: Is it legal to remove watermarks?
legal.answer: You should only remove watermarks from content you own or have rights to modify. We're designed for creators removing their own watermarks or licensed content.

Footer.tagline: Professional AI watermark removal for content creators.

Pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
Pricing.subtitle: Buy credits once, use anytime. No subscriptions, no hidden fees.
Pricing.freeCredits: New users get 3 FREE credits to try the service!

creditInfo.fast: credit = 1 Fast mode video (up to 5 min)
creditInfo.hq: credits = 1 HQ mode video (up to 5 min)

Pricing.redeemSubtitle: Enter your promo code or gift card below to add credits instantly.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: At Vanishly, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our video watermark removal service.

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
dataCollection.content: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, upload videos, or contact us for support. This includes your email address, name, and the videos you upload for processing.

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Information
dataUsage.content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, process your video watermark removal requests, communicate with you about your account, and send you technical notices and support messages.

dataStorage.title: Data Storage and Security
dataStorage.content: Your uploaded videos are temporarily stored for processing and are automatically deleted within 24 hours after processing is complete. We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your data.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.content: We use third-party services for authentication (Clerk), payment processing (Stripe), and cloud storage (Cloudflare R2). These services have their own privacy policies governing their use of your information.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at privacy@vanishly.io.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing or using Vanishly, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our service.

service.title: Description of Service
service.content: Vanishly provides an AI-powered video watermark removal service. We use advanced machine learning algorithms to process and remove watermarks from your videos.

accounts.title: User Accounts
accounts.content: You must create an account to use our service. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account.

content.title: User Content
content.content: You retain ownership of all videos you upload. By using our service, you warrant that you have the right to process the content you upload and that your use does not infringe on any third-party rights.

payment.title: Payment Terms
payment.content: Credits are purchased on a one-time basis and do not expire. All purchases are final and non-refundable, except as required by law or at our sole discretion.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: Vanishly is provided 'as is' without warranties of any kind. We are not liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising from your use of the service.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. We will notify users of significant changes via email or through the service.
